body_html:
You are right, this seems to be a deeper runtime issue. It looks as if the tensor is added to session store when get_session_handle is fetched directly, and not added when it's executed as a dependency of a fetch

The relevant logic is in this commit
098f930

Note that the author of this functionality has left Google

body:
You are right, this seems to be a deeper runtime issue. It looks as if the tensor is added to session store when get_session_handle is fetched directly, and not added when it's executed as a dependency of a fetch

The relevant logic is in this commit
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/098f930de4ef044021f3ef1d3cdd6848c23eddb0

Note that the author of this functionality has left Google
